Name: One Clone Left
About the game: CLONE yourself to create the deadliest army in the wasteland. FRAG every mutant zombie in sight... but watch out for bandits that scavenge the bodies. LEVEL UP and pick the best perks to boost your combat and cloning abilities. DEPLOY your weapon as a sentry gun that automatically scans for targets. THROW grenades and dynamite to take out the zombies feasting on your clones. MAYHEM and noise will attract bandits and government troops. BANDITS survive by looting and the government... they need every cloning device they can find. If you like games where the ground turns crimson and messy with bits and pieces of zombie then this is the game for you! > Over 50 Perks > Over 60 Enemies > Over 20 Weapons > Play the maps in any order > Clone yourself for extra Lives and build an Army One Clone Left Features: Single or multiplayer LAN Co-op (up to 4 players) or death match (up to 6) Most weapons have secondary functions Enemy waves increase in difficulty Survive getting caught between warring Factions Destructible environments Leveling system with randomized Perks to choose from Finishing a map rewards you with a Permanent Perk Randomized and varied map layouts Maps feature scripted random Events and Enemies NPC allies will fight for you and provide you with quests Game difficulty adjusts for the number of players in the map Weather effects Day and night cycles and lots of blood and gore!
